name: Moons over Meowami
description:
The Egyptian goddess of protection and cats, Bastet, needs help fighting Apep, an evil snake god, who tries to eat the sun and kill the almighty god Ra! She believes you will be a worthy champion to aid her in this endeavor but wishes to test your skill to avoid sending you to certain death. You must complete a series of trials meant to test your mind, body, and soul.

In this fun take on Egyptian mythology and aesthetics, you play as a skilled cat that has the ability to change colors, manipulate gravity, and fight! Can you pass the tests and save the world from the snake god?!

Features to look forward to in our game:

  • Stealth!
  • Wall jumping!
  • Exciting combat!
  • Egyptian vaporwave!
  • Cats!

Credits:

Game created by Gamma Leonis
